title: Monster Scale Summit 2024 - Opening Keynote
description: ScyllaDB's annual conference opening keynote highlighting the latest innovations in NoSQL database technology
speaker: Dor Laor - CEO & Co-Founder, ScyllaDB

title: Building AI Applications with ScyllaDB
description: Learn how to leverage ScyllaDB for AI and machine learning workloads at scale
speaker: Piotr Sarna - VP Engineering, ScyllaDB

title: From Cassandra to ScyllaDB: Migration Best Practices
description: Real-world migration stories and proven strategies for moving from Apache Cassandra to ScyllaDB
speaker: Guy Shtub - Solutions Architect, ScyllaDB

title: ScyllaDB Performance Optimization Techniques
description: Advanced techniques for tuning ScyllaDB for maximum throughput and minimal latency
speaker: Avi Kivity - CTO & Co-Founder, ScyllaDB

title: Real-Time Analytics at Scale with ScyllaDB
description: How leading companies use ScyllaDB for real-time analytics processing billions of events per day
speaker: Tzach Livyatan - VP Product, ScyllaDB

title: ScyllaDB Cloud: Fully Managed Database as a Service
description: Introduction to ScyllaDB Cloud and how it simplifies database operations at any scale
speaker: Felipe Cardeneti Mendes - Principal Product Manager, ScyllaDB

title: Gaming at Monster Scale: Discord's Journey with ScyllaDB
description: How Discord handles trillions of messages using ScyllaDB for extreme low latency
speaker: Bo Ingram - Senior Staff Engineer, Discord

title: ScyllaDB Architecture Deep Dive
description: Understanding ScyllaDB's shard-per-core architecture and how it achieves extreme performance
speaker: Avi Kivity - CTO & Co-Founder, ScyllaDB

title: Time Series Data at Scale with ScyllaDB
description: Best practices for modeling and querying time series data in ScyllaDB
speaker: Cynthia Dunlop - Developer Advocate, ScyllaDB

title: ScyllaDB vs DynamoDB: Performance Comparison
description: Comprehensive benchmark comparing ScyllaDB and Amazon DynamoDB across various workloads
speaker: Piotr Sarna - VP Engineering, ScyllaDB

title: Multi-Region Deployment Strategies
description: Architecting globally distributed applications with ScyllaDB across multiple regions
speaker: Guy Shtub - Solutions Architect, ScyllaDB

title: Comcast's Journey to 1 Trillion Messages with ScyllaDB
description: How Comcast processes over 1 trillion messages using ScyllaDB for their IoT platform
speaker: Nate McCall - Engineering Manager, Comcast
